message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll see its value. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1100000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. Considering the product's value to you is $1500000, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1200000. I believe this is a fair price that balances our interests.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from that number. I'm willing to go up to $1050000, but I think that's the maximum I can stretch. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1200000. However, I'm willing to make a slight concession to $1150000. I believe this is a fair price that still reflects the product's value to you.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1080000, but I think that's the most I can stretch. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to get as close to your budget as possible, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $1150000. I'm willing to make a small concession to $1125000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to go up to $1095000, but I think that's the most I can stretch. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to get as close to your budget as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession to $1100000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
